# elemental

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

elemental is a R package containing **e**co**l**ogical nich**e** **m**od**e**ls for the pla**n**ts of bri**ta**in and ire**l**and.

## Installation

You can install the development version of elemental from [here](https://github.com/NERC-CEH/elemental) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("NERC-CEH/elemental")
```
